txt.en: Angârmu has asked you to help him find his missing pet, Ershûr.
Return to Angârmu with his beloved pet, Ershûr
Return to Angârmu in Malgâma near Zikrum-dûl with his beloved pet, Ershûr.
Look for Angârmu's pet, Ershûr, at the camp.

'You found him! My sweet Ershûr. I have missed you!'

Angârmu takes the rock from you and hugs it with a wide smile on his face.

'You are a true friend. To me and my dear Ershûr. Thank you. I can now be certain he is safe from harm.'
Return to Angârmu with his beloved pet, Ershûr
Returned Angârmu's beloved pet to him
Angârmu has asked you to recover his beloved pet who has yet to come home.
Found the camp that Angârmu mentioned

'A visitor! A welcome sight! I ask of you to find my beloved pet. My beloved Ershûr. He wandered somewhere I know not.

'He must be at the camping spot! Yes! That is his favourite spot. Ershûr must have ran off to go there. But I can not go, I must stay here.

'You must go to his camping spot near the river to the south-east for me and find dear Ershûr. Find him, and bring him back to me so that I can keep him safe.

'And tell him... tell him I miss him dearly.'
Find the camp that Angârmu mentioned
